en: Who has believed what we have heard?
He grew up before him like a young plant

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a metsèm la ne ńgwága yé,
en: He was despised and rejected by men,

ngiemboon: Tá mbà yé zɔ la kaa ngɔ́ʼ yege ḿbiʼ,
en: Yet he himself bore our sicknesses,

ngiemboon: Táʼ, mé la néŋ fʉ̌ŋ na yé,
en: But he was pierced because of our rebellion,

ngiemboon: Peg la pú ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ menjʉ̀njÿò mie é pyeté.
en: We all went astray like sheep;

ngiemboon: Mé la gÿo à gyá ngɔ́ʼ,

en: He was taken away because of oppression and judgment,

ngiemboon: Mé la néŋe yé nùɔ pʉ̀a tepòŋ,
en: He was assigned a grave with the wicked,

ngiemboon: Táʼ, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ la kwoŋ ngie à gyá ngɔ́ʼ.
en: Yet the Lord was pleased   to crush him severely.  # 53:10 Or him; he made him sick.,# 53:10 Dt 29:22; Is 17:11

ngiemboon: À ge gÿo é cʉate na ngɔ́ʼ gie à ka gyǎ,

en: Therefore I will give him   the many as a portion,
